alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wakulla and southwestern Leon Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 334 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Crawfordville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Newport, Shadeville, Brown House, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Smith Creek and Medart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
